text: Newhart is an American sitcom series that aired on CBS from 1982 to 1990. It stars Bob Newhart, Mary Frann, Julia Duffy, Jennifer Holmes, Tom Poston, Steven Kampmann, William Sanderson, Peter Scolari, Linda Carlson. ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 television series debuts Category:American sitcoms Category:1990 American television series endings Category:CBS network shows
title: Newhart
